content: HOUSTON Costco Wholesale Corp  which sells some of the cheapest gasoline in the country  says a revised tariff overhaul on the giant Colonial Pipeline would add to its costs of providing gasoline.

content: LOS ANGELES  Nov 26 A multi-state E. coli outbreak that has sickened at least 19 people who ate rotisserie chicken salad sold at Costco Wholesale Corp's stores has been traced to a celery-and-onion mix used in the salad  prompting its California maker to recall the product.
name: Costco Wholesale Corporation
title: E. coli from Costco chicken salad traced to tainted celery

content: At least 19 people in seven states may have been infected by E.  coli after eating rotisserie chicken salad sold at Costco Wholesale Corp's  stores  the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said on Tuesday.
name: Costco Wholesale Corporation
title: CDC says at least 19 E. coli infections linked to Costco chicken salad

content: Nov 24 At least 19 people in seven states may have been infected by E.  coli after eating rotisserie chicken salad sold at Costco Wholesale Corp's stores  the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said on Tuesday.
name: Costco Wholesale Corporation
title: UPDATE 3-CDC says at least 19 E. coli infections linked to Costco chicken salad

content: Nov 24 Costco Wholesale Corp stopped selling chicken salad at its stores on Friday  the day it was notified by the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and other authorities that it was linked to cases of E. coli  an executive at the retailer said on Tuesday.
name: Costco Wholesale Corporation
title: Costco says has halted chicken salad sales after E.coli cases

content: BANGKOK  Oct 5 Environmental activist group Greenpeace on Monday urged the world's largest manufacturer of canned tuna  Thai Union Group Pcl  to free its supply chains of destructive fishing practices and alleged labour abuses.
name: Costco Wholesale Corporation
title: Greenpeace takes aim at Thai tuna firm  urges end to alleged abuses

content: NEW YORK  Sept 8 Costco Wholesale Corp  willfully infringed Tiffany & Co's trademarks by selling counterfeit diamond engagement rings bearing the luxury retailer's name and must face a jury trial to assess damages  a U.S. judge ruled on Tuesday.
name: Costco Wholesale Corporation
title: Costco sold counterfeit Tiffany engagement rings-U.S. judge

content: NEW YORK Costco Wholesale Corp willfully infringed Tiffany & Co's trademarks by selling counterfeit diamond engagement rings bearing the luxury retailer's name and must face a jury trial to assess damages  a U.S. judge ruled on Tuesday.

content: Sam's Club  the warehouse division of Wal-Mart Stores Inc  has tied up with online car-shopping service TrueCar Inc to make a full-fledged foray into auto sales  a fast-growing business for rival Costco Wholesale Corp.

title: Sam's Club jumps into auto sales with TrueCar tie-up

content: NEW YORK/BANGKOK  Aug 21 (Thomson Reuters Foundation) - A U.S. lawsuit accusing retailer Costco Wholesale Corp. of knowingly selling frozen prawns linked to a company that uses slave labor was described on Friday as "entirely without merit" by Thai seafood supply company CP Food Products.
name: Costco Wholesale Corporation
title: US lawsuit accuses Costco  Thai supplier of selling prawns produced by slaves

content: NEW YORK American Express Co was accused in a lawsuit on Thursday of blindsiding investors with the loss of a crucial contract with Costco Wholesale Corp after having failed to reveal how significant that business had become.
name: Costco Wholesale Corporation
title: American Express sued for misleading investors about Costco

name: Costco Wholesale Corporation
title: American Express sued for misleading investors about Costco business

content: SANTIAGO Chile's salmon farmers are using record levels of antibiotics to treat a virulent and pervasive bacteria  driving away some U.S. retailers including Costco Wholesale Corp  which is turning to antibiotic-free Norwegian salmon.
name: Costco Wholesale Corporation
title: Addicted to antibiotics  Chile's salmon flops at Costco  grocers

content: TORONTO Costco Wholesale Corp   Sam's Club  and a handful of other large retailers have disabled their online photo printing stores in recent days  on concerns about a possible data breach at PNI Digital Media  which manages and/or hosts photo services sites.

title: Costco  Sam's Club  others halt photo sites over possible breach

name: Costco Wholesale Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Costco  Sam's Club  others halt photo sites over possible breach

content: TORONTO  July 20 Half a dozen online photo printing stores based in the United States  UK and Canada  including those of Costco Wholesale Corp and Sam's Club   became in recent days the latest retailers to face a possible data breach at PNI Digital Media  which manages and/or hosts photo services sites.
name: Costco Wholesale Corporation
title: Costco  Sam's Club  others halt photo sites over possible breach

content: NEW YORK U.S. crude prices rose on Tuesday as a tropical storm moved ashore in the oil-producing state of Texas  but global oversupply limited gains and pressured Brent futures.
name: Costco Wholesale Corporation
title: U.S. crude oil up as tropical storm goes ashore in Texas

name: Costco Wholesale Corporation
title: Brent edges up  U.S. crude off low as Fed weakens dollar

content: NEW YORK Oil prices fell in volatile trading on Monday as the Greek debt crisis raised concerns about demand for petroleum in Europe and as the U.N. started talks to try to bring peace to Yemen  where OPEC heavyweight Saudi Arabia is involved in a civil war.
name: Costco Wholesale Corporation
title: Oil slips on Greece concerns as July Brent expires
